conbody.p: In this article, you will learn how to terminate a test execution automatically by configuring a maximum number of test failures in manual view or via the command-line option, with examples using common use cases.

ul.li: A Katalon Runtime Engine License. See Katalon licensing.

conbody.p: Consider using the condition to terminate execution when a set of tests is mature and takes hours to finish. Once a significant number of tests fail, they may fail for the same cause. This feature helps you save time, provide early feedback, and avoid the execution of unnecessary test cases.
